00051 namespace RODOS {
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 
00055 /** Computes a 16 bit checksum (len in bytes) adding bytes and rotating result */
00056 uint32_t checkSum(uint8_t *buf, int len) ;
00057 
00058 
00059 /** computes a 16 bit crc in a non optimized way **/
00060 uint32_t computeCrc(const uint8_t* buf, int32_t len, int32_t initialValue);
00061 
00062 
00063 /** An optimized crc generator.
00064   * first it generates a luck up table to speed up the crc computation
00065   * use only one in the system. more is not required.
00066   */
00067 
00068 class CRC {
00069     uint32_t lookUpTable[256];
00070 public:
00071     CRC(); 
00072     uint32_t computeCRC(uint8_t* buf, int32_t len, int32_t initialValue);
00073 };
00074 
00075 
00076 /** Delivers a 16 bit  hash value for a string.
00077  *  both bytes contain only printable characters
00078  */
00079 
00080 uint16_t hash(const char* str);
00081 
00082 
00083 /// Computes the checkSum of an array of bytes, according to CCSDS algorithm.
00084 /// Warning: There are several checksum standars. See rodos checksum too
00085 uint32_t checkSumXor(uint8_t *buf, int len);
